text: Added experimental support for configured features in data packs.
Renamed the minecraft:decorated_flower feature to minecraft:no_bonemeal_flower
Added the minecraft:dripstone_cluster, minecraft:large_dripstone, and minecraft:small_dripstone features

texts.text: Configured feature

Features are unique elements of the world like trees, flowers, ore, etc. Configured features are stored as JSON files within a data pack in the path data/<namespace>/worldgen/configured_feature. They are used in world generation as a part of placed features.
JSON format

When another configured feature is required inside the settings, it can either be provided with a string tag as the namespaced id of another configured feature, or with a compound tag as a nested definition.

The root tag.
 type: The feature type. Valid options are listed below.
 config:
Configuration properties of this feature type, specified below.
The possible values for  type and associated config:

bamboo—Generates a single bamboo column with a height between 5 and 16 blocks. Requires a block below that is inside the block tag.
 probability: The probability for a podzol disk to generate below the bamboo. The disk has a radius of 1 to 4 blocks.

basalt_columns
 reach: Int provider between 0 and 3.
Int provider[show]
 height: Int provider between 1 and 10.
Int provider[show]

basalt_pillar
This feature has no config properties.

block_column
 direction: The direction of the column. One of up, down, north, east, south, or west.
 allowed_placement: A block predicate.
Block predicate[show]
 prioritize_tip: Determines where to cut off blocks when space is restricted. If true, will start removing layers from the start of the column.
 layers: The layers.
 height: Int provider specifying the height of the layer.
Int provider[show]
 provider: The block to use for this layer.
Block state provider[show]

block_pile
 state_provider: The block to use.
Block state provider[show]

blue_ice
This feature has no config properties.

bonus_chest
This feature has no config properties.

chorus_plant
This feature has no config properties.

coral_claw
This feature has no config properties.

coral_mushroom
This feature has no config properties.

coral_tree
This feature has no config properties.

delta_feature
 contents: The block to use on the inside of the delta.
Block state[show]
 rim: The block to use for the rim of the delta.
Block state[show]
 size: Int provider between 0 and 16.
Int provider[show]
 rim_size: Int provider between 0 and 16.
Int provider[show]

desert_well
This feature has no config properties.

disk—Only if there is water at the current block, places blocks in a circular formation using the  radius and twice the  half_height blocks deep.
 state: The block to use.
Block state[show]
 radius: Int provider between 0 and 8.
Int provider[show]
 half_height: Value between 0 and 4.
 targets: The blocks to replace.
A block state.
Block state[show]

dripstone_cluster
 floor_to_ceiling_search_range: Value between 1 and 512. For how many blocks the feature will search for the floor or ceiling.
 height: Int provider between 0 and 128.
Int provider[show]
 radius: Int provider between 0 and 128.
Int provider[show]
 max_stalagmite_stalactite_height_diff: Value between 0 and 64.
 height_deviation: Value between 1 and 64.
 dripstone_block_layer_thickness: Int provider between 0 and 128.
Int provider[show]
 density: Float provider between 0 and 2.
Float provider[show]
 wetness: Float provider between 0 and 2.
Float provider[show]
 chance_of_dripstone_column_at_max_distance_from_center: Value between 0 and 1.
 max_distance_from_edge_affecting_chance_of_dripstone_column: Value between 1 and 64.
 max_distance_from_center_affecting_height_bias: Value between 1 and 64.

end_gateway
 exact: Whether the gateway should teleport entities in the exact exit position.
 exit: (optional) The block position where the gateway should exit.
X coordinate.
Y coordinate.
Z coordinate.

end_island
This feature has no config properties.

end_spike
 crystal_invulnerable: (optional) Defaults to false.
 crystal_beam_target: (optional) Block position of the beam target.
: The X coordinate.
: The Y coordinate.
: The Z coordinate.
 spikes:
A spike configuration.
 centerX: (optional) The X coordinate.
 centerZ: (optional) The Z coordinate.
 radius: (optional) The radius of the spike.
 height: (optional) The height of the spike.
 guarded: (optional) Whether to generate a cage around the crystal.

fill_layer—Fills all air blocks in a 16x1x16 layer of blocks. Used by the game in flat worlds.
 state: The block to fill with.
Block state[show]
 height: Value between 0 and 4064. The layer to fill, starting at the bottom of the world.

flower
Identical to the random_patch feature.

forest_rock
 state: The block to use.
Block state[show]

fossil—Can place a small structure.
 fossil_structures:
: A fossil structure.
 overlay_structures:
: An overlay structure.
 fossil_processors
Template:Nbt inherit/structure processor
 overlay_processors
Template:Nbt inherit/structure processor
 max_empty_corners_allowed: How many corners of the structure are allowed to be empty for it to generate. Prevents structures floating in the air.

freeze_top_layer—Places snow and replaces water with ice in snowy biomes. This feature should be added to all biomes.
This feature has no config properties.

geode
 blocks:
 filling_provider: The block used for the filling.
Block state provider[show]
 inner_layer_provider: The block used for the inner layer.
Block state provider[show]
 alternate_inner_layer_provider: The block used for the alternate inner layer.
Block state provider[show]
 middle_layer_provider: The block used for the middle layer.
Block state provider[show]
 outer_layer_provider: The block used for the outer layer.
Block state provider[show]
 inner_placements:
A block state.
Block state[show]
 cannot_replace: A block tag listing which blocks not to replace.
 invalid_blocks: A block tag listing invalid blocks. The feature placement fails entirely when an invalid block is found.
 layers:
 filling: (optional) Value between 0.01 and 50. Defaults to 1.7.
 inner_layer: (optional) Value between 0.01 and 50. Defaults to 2.2.
 middle_layer: (optional) Value between 0.01 and 50. Defaults to 3.2.
 outer_layer: (optional) Value between 0.01 and 50. Defaults to 4.2.
 crack:
 generate_crack_chance: (optional) Value between 0 and 1. Defaults to 1.
 base_crack_size: (optional) Value between 0 and 5. Defaults to 2.
 crack_point_offset: (optional) Value between 0 and 10. Defaults to 2.
 noise_multiplier: (optional) Value between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.05.
 use_potential_placements_chance: (optional) Value between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.35.
 use_alternate_layer0_chance: (optional) Value between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.35. The chance that the inner layer will use the alternate block provider.
 placements_require_layer0_alternate: (optional) Defaults to true. Whether the inner placements are only allowed on the alternate inner blocks.
 outer_wall_distance: (optional) Int provider between 1 and 20. Defaults to a uniform int between 4 and 5.
Int provider[show]
 distribution_points: (optional) Int provider between 1 and 20. Defaults to a uniform int between 3 and 4.
Int provider[show]
 point_offset: (optional) Int provider between 1 and 10. Defaults to a uniform int between 1 and 2.
Int provider[show]
 min_gen_offset: (optional) Defaults to -16.
 max_gen_offset: (optional) Defaults to 16.

glow_lichen
 search_range: (optional) Value between 1 and 64. Defaults to 10.
 chance_of_spreading: (optional) Value between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.5.
 can_place_on_floor: (optional) Defaults to false.
 can_place_on_ceiling: (optional) Defaults to false.
 can_place_on_wall: (optional) Defaults to false.
 can_be_placed_on:
A block ID.

glowstone_blob
This feature has no config properties.

huge_brown_mushroom
 cap_provider: The block to use for the cap.
Block state provider[show]
 stem_provider: The block to use for the stem.
Block state provider[show]
 foliage_radius: (optional) The size of the cap. Defaults to 2.

huge_fungus
 hat_state: The block to use for the hat.
Block state[show]
 decor_state: The block to use as decoration.
Block state[show]
 stem_state: The block to use for the stem.
Block state[show]
 valid_base_block: The block to place on top of.
Block state[show]
 planted: (optional) Defaults to false.

huge_red_mushroom
Identical to the huge_brown_mushroom feature.

ice_patch
Identical to the disk feature

ice_spike
This feature has no config properties.

iceberg
 state: The block to use.
Block state[show]

kelp
This feature has no config properties.

lake
 fluid: The block to use for the fluid of the lake.
Block state[show]
 barrier: The block to use for the barrier of the lake.
Block state[show]

large_dripstone
 floor_to_ceiling_search_range: (optional) Value between 1 and 512. Defaults to 30.
 column_radius: Int provider between 0 and 20.
Int provider[show]
 height_scale: Float provider between 0 and 20.
Float provider[show]
 max_column_radius_to_cave_height_ratio: Value between 0 and 1.
 stalactite_bluntness: Float provider between 0.1 and 10.
Float provider[show]
 stalagmite_bluntness: Float provider between 0.1 and 10.
Float provider[show]
 wind_speed: Float provider between 0 and 2.
Float provider[show]
 min_radius_for_wind: Value between 0 and 100.

monster_room
This feature has no config properties.

nether_forest_vegetation
 state_provider: The block to use.
Block state provider[show]
 spread_width: Must be at least 1.
 spread_height: Must be at least 1.

netherrack_replace_blobs—Replaces all target blocks in a certain radius with another block. If it doesn't find the target block at its position, it will move down before generating until it finds one.
 state: The block to use.
Block state[show]
 target: The block to replace.
Block state[show]
 radius: Int provider between 0 and 12.
Int provider[show]

no_bonemeal_flower
The config properties are identical to the random_patch feature.

no_op—Does nothing. Useful for overwriting existing configured features.
This feature has no config properties.

ore
 size: Value between 0 and 64. Does not directly correspond with the amount of blocks placed.[more information needed]
 discard_chance_on_air_exposure: Value between 0 and 1. The chance for an ore block to be discarded when it is exposed to air. Setting this to 1 makes the ore completely hidden.
 targets: A list of targets.
A target
 target: Rule test. The blocks to replace.
Template:Nbt inherit/rule test
 state: The block to use.
Block state[show]

pointed_dripstone
 chance_of_taller_dripstone: (optional) Value between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.2.
 chance_of_directional_spread: (optional) Value between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.7.
 chance_of_spread_radius2: (optional) Value between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.5.
 chance_of_spread_radius3: (optional) Value between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.5.

random_boolean_selector—Randomly chooses one of two features with each having an equal chance.
 feature_false: The placed feature 1.
 feature_true: The placed feature 2.

random_patch
 tries: (optional) Defaults to 128.
 xz_spread: (optional) Defaults to 7.
 y_spread: (optional) Defaults to 3.
 feature: The placed feature to use.

random_selector—Randomly chooses a feature from a list with chances.
 features:
A feature and its corresponding chance.
 default: The placed feature to use.
 chance: The chance of this feature being chosen.
 default: The placed feature to use if none of the above features are chosen.

replace_single_block—Replaces a single block using a list of targets and states.
 targets: A list of targets.
A target
 target: Rule test. The blocks to replace.
Template:Nbt inherit/rule test
 state: The block to use.
Block state[show]

root_system—Generates a root column with a feature on top.
 required_vertical_space_for_tree: A value between 1 and 64.
 root_radius: A value between 1 and 64.
 root_placement_attempts: A value between 1 and 256.
 root_column_max_height: A value between 1 and 4096.
 hanging_root_radius: A value between 1 and 64.
 hanging_roots_vertical_span: A value between 1 and 16.
 hanging_root_placement_attempts: A value between 1 and 256.
 allowed_vertical_water_for_tree: A value between 1 and 64.
 root_replaceable: A block tag specifying which blocks can be replaced by the root column.
 root_state_provider: The block to use for the root column.
Block state provider[show]
 hanging_root_state_provider: The block to use hanging below the root column.
Block state provider[show]
 allowed_tree_position: The block predicate used to check if the tree position is valid.
 feature: The placed feature to place on top of the root system.

scattered_ore
The config properties are identical to the ore feature.

sea_pickle
 count: Int provider between 0 and 256.
Int provider[show]

seagrass
 probability: Value between 0 and 1.

simple_block
 to_place: The block to use.
Block state provider[show]

simple_random_selector—Randomly chooses a feature from a list with each having an equal chance.
 features: A list of features to choose from. Either all strings or all compounds.
: The feature to place.

spring_feature
 state: Fluid state. The fluid to use.
 rock_count: (optional) Defaults to 4.
 hole_count: (optional) Defaults to 1.
 requires_block_below: (optional) Whether the spring feature requires a block below the fluid. Defaults to true.
 valid_blocks: A list of valid blocks to place the spring feature in.
The namespaced id of the block.

tree
 ignore_vines: (optional) Defaults to false. Allows the tree to generate even if there are vines blocking it.
 force_dirt: (optional) Defaults to false. If true, will place the dirt provider even when the block below the tree is not a grass block or mycelium.
 minimum_size: Defines the width of the tree at different heights, for the minimum size of the feature.
 type: One of two_layers_feature_size or three_layers_feature_size
 min_clipped_height: (optional) Value between 0 and 80. If the possible height at this location is lower than what the trunk placer requires, but greater or equal to this value, the tree will generate anyway.
If type is two_layers_feature_size:
 limit: (optional) Value between 0 and 81. Defaults to 1. At heights lower than this value, the feature size will return the value of lower_size, otherwise upper_size.
 lower_size: (optional) Value between 0 and 16. Defaults to 0. Minimum width of the tree at heights under limit.
 upper_size: (optional) Value between 0 and 16. Defaults to 1. Minimum width of the tree at heights greater than or equals limit.
If type is three_layers_feature_size:
 limit: (optional) Must be between 0 and 80. Defaults to 1. At heights lower than this value, the feature size will return the value of lower_size, otherwise upper_size or middle_size.
 upper_limit: (optional) Must be between 0 and 80. Defaults to 1. At heights between this and limit, the feature size will return the value of middle_size. If it is greater or equals, it will use upper_size.
 lower_size: (optional) Must be between 0 and 16. Defaults to 0. Minimum width of the tree at the lowest layer.
 middle_size: (optional) Must be between 0 and 16. Defaults to 1. Minimum width of the tree at the middle layer.
 upper_size: (optional) Must be between 0 and 16. Defaults to 1. Minimum width of the tree at the upper layer.
 dirt_provider: The block to place below the trunk. Only places if force_dirt is true, or if there is a grass block or mycelium below the trunk.
Block state provider[show]
 trunk_provider: The block to use for the trunk.
Block state provider[show]
 foliage_provider: The block to use for the foliage.
Block state provider[show]
 trunk_placer:
 type: One of straight_trunk_placer, forking_trunk_placer, giant_trunk_placer, mega_jungle_trunk_placer, dark_oak_trunk_placer, or fancy_trunk_placer.
 base_height: Must be between 0 and 32.
 height_rand_a: Must be between 0 and 24.
 height_rand_b: Must be between 0 and 24.
If type is bending_trunk_placer:
 bend_length: Int provider between 1 and 64.
Int provider[show]
 min_height_for_leaves: (optional) Value needs to be at least 1. Defaults to 1.
 foliage_placer:
 type: One of blob_foliage_placer, spruce_foliage_placer, pine_foliage_placer, acacia_foliage_placer, bush_foliage_placer, fancy_foliage_placer, jungle_foliage_placer, mega_pine_foliage_placer, or dark_oak_foliage_placer.
If type is blob_foliage_placer, bush_foliage_placer, fancy_foliage_placer, or jungle_foliage_placer:
 height: Affects the foliage height and size in block height. Value between 0 and 16.
 radius: [needs testing]
 offset: (Presumably) a random offset from the trunk block on which this piece of foliage is centered.[needs testing]
If type is spruce_foliage_placer:
 trunk_height: Int provider between 0 and 24.
Int provider[show]
If type is pine_foliage_placer:
 height: Int provider between 0 and 24.
Int provider[show]
If type is mega_pine_foliage_placer:
 crown_height: Int provider between 0 and 24.
Int provider[show]
If type is random_spread_foliage_placer:
 foliage_height: Int provider between 1 and 512.
Int provider[show]
 leaf_placement_attempts: Value between 0 and 256.
 decorators: Decorations to add to the tree apart from the trunk and leaves.
A decorator.
 type: The type of decoration to add. One of trunk_vine, leave_vine, cocoa, beehive, or alter_ground.
If type is cocoa or beehive:
 probability: Value between 0 and 1.
If type is alter_ground:
 provider: The block to replace the ground with.
Block state provider[show]

twisting_vines
 spread_width: Must be at least 1.
 spread_height: Must be at least 1.
 max_height: Must be at least 1.

underwater_magma
 floor_search_range: Value between 0 and 512.
 placement_radius_around_floor: Value between 0 and 64.
 placement_probability_per_valid_position: Value between 0 and 1.

vegetation_patch
 surface: The surface to place on. One of floor, or ceiling
 depth: Int provider between 1 and 128.
Int provider[show]
 vertical_range: Value between 1 and 256.
 extra_bottom_block_chance: Value between 0 and 1.
 extra_edge_column_chance: Value between 0 and 1.
 vegetation_chance: Value between 0 and 1. The chance that a vegetation feature will be placed, is evaluated for each block.
 xz_radius: Int provider. The radius of the patch.
Int provider[show]
 replaceable: A block tag specifying what blocks this feature can replace.
 ground_state: The block to use for the ground of the patch.
Block state provider[show]
 vegetation_feature: The placed feature to place on top of the patch.

vines
This feature has no config properties.

void_start_platform
This feature has no config properties.

waterlogged_vegetation_patch—A vegetation patch but it will try to waterlog the blocks placed.
The config properties are identical to the vegetation_patch feature.

weeping_vines
This feature has no config properties.
